title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Junior Ranger Activity Book
body: Glacier Bay Junior Ranger Activity Book           Become the next Glacier Bay Junior Ranger!   Glacier Bay Junior Ranger Activity Book 26 pages PDF So you want to become a Glacier Bay National Park Junior Ranger? This activity book has 26 pages of fun learning activities. Some of the answers you can find within this website. Others you may have to complete when you arrive in Glacier Bay. When complete, show it to a park ranger and receive your official badge.
